title: Do you think “Please speak up!” carries a commanding tone, like an order? I mean the exclamation mark in the end. - Quora

response.answer_text: Yeah. “Please” makes it less demanding, but can be compensated for with tone or (in writing) saying that it didn’t seem to be a request. But having “you” as the subject in this instance (it’s implied, even if it’s not visible) also increases the authority. The exclamation point adds to it as well.
